Strings.String: The .NET Framework 3.0 is required to install this language pack.
Administrator permissions are required to install the .NET Framework 3.0. Contact your administrator.
Another instance of setup is already running. The running instance must complete before this setup can proceed.
A beta version of the .NET Framework was detected on the computer. Uninstall any previous beta versions of .NET Framework before continuing.
A failure occurred attempting to install the .NET Framework 3.0.
